00226 class SelectableInterfaceRequestCmpLess {
00227    public:
00228       bool operator()( const SelectableInterfaceRequest* a,
00229                        const SelectableInterfaceRequest* b ) const
00230       {
00231          return (a->getTimeout() - a->getUsedIOTime()) <
00232             (b->getTimeout() - b->getUsedIOTime());
00233       }
00234 
00235 
00236       bool operator()( const SelectableInterfaceRequest& a,
00237                        const SelectableInterfaceRequest& b )
00238       {
00239          return (a.getTimeout() - a.getUsedIOTime()) <
00240             (b.getTimeout() - b.getUsedIOTime());
00241       }
00242 };
